questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant shape of this product container?

Examining the handle's structure, what is its descriptive form?
What is the apparent texture of the plastic container's surface?
Focusing on the container's top, what type of closure is present?
Considering the entire product, is the design predominantly simple or complex?
Based solely on the image, is the container opaque or transparent?

Describe the position of the handle relative to the main body of the container?

What is the overall visual impression of the product's color scheme?
